tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's worth it, a year ago I started my treatment and now I can see the changes and I'm very happy with the results. And most importantly Doctor and the staff everyone is friendly, Doctor explain everything in detail, if you have any questions you can ask them without any hesitation and I'm very much happy with the staff, they would inform me about everything from my appointment to every minor details and they would arrange appointment according to my schedule. I never had to worry about anything, anything! I can say, Professionalism at it best!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently visited Dentalfix for a root cannel and cleaning. I am thoroughly impressed with the service I received. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and professional. The waiting area was clean and comfortable, making the short wait time pleasant.

Dr.  Dipika Bharani was fantastic. They took the time to explain the procedure and answered all my questions, making sure I was comfortable throughout the process. The equipment used was modern, and I could tell that hygiene and patient care are top priorities at this clinic.

The cleaning was thorough yet gentle, and I appreciated the dentist's attention to detail. I left the clinic feeling well taken care of and informed about my dental health.

I highly recommend dentalfix to anyone looking for a reliable and friendly dental clinic. The combination of excellent service, professional staff, and a clean environment makes it my go-to place for dental care.

Thank you, Dentalfix, for a great experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went  to Dr.Dipika through reference & this was my first time visit to dental clinic. Dr.Dipika she explained to me everything  very well.I went for filling my cavity & cleaning the teeth.The procedure didn't take much time.The clinic is so clean  & they did the procedure with a soothing music on.Staff is also very good ,polite & so helpful.The whole procedure was not too expensive also.I am very very happy with the service.I would suggest everyone to visit this clinic if they have any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Metal Braces Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Cavities,Tooth Sensitivity,
review: It has been over 2 years I have been getting my dental treatments from Dentalfix. Dr. Dipika’s diagnosis and evaluation of the condition of my teeth was on point. She gave options in terms of potential treatments and her suggestions are sustainable and what you actually need. She looks at the overall oral health and suggests treatments that will ensure effective and long lasting oral health. My oral health has improved tremendously. I went to her because I was developing a gap in my teeth and she addressed some other concerns like cavities, tooth sensitivity and tartar deposits. Over a year with her guidance and treatments, my teeth feel much better and I am very conscious about my oral health. Her specialist doctors, the ones who worked on my root canal and my braces have done a fantastic job. They are available if there is a problem and it’s instantly fixed. Dr. Dipika is one of the few doctors who I completely trust!  I would highly recommend a visit to Dentalfix if you are looking at healthy and long lasting oral hygiene.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Space Maintainers,Metal Braces Fixing,
review:
This is the right place for your dental care i had been referred her by my friend who too is satisfied with the treatment, Here the team work is extremely excellent, Dr.Dipika and Dr. Krupa *** *** **** *** are focused on what is needed and by right way, Even my child Who is 8 yrs only was been treated under Dr.Krupa,she is excellent as she knows how to handle children's with fun and friendliness so that they dont feel the phobia of Painfull Doctor.
She had done his tooth filling, Root canal, Metal cap and Extraction of tooth all above was well managed. Even my child was not afraid in fact he use to remember the appointment and would like to meet Dr.Krupa his friend who use to explain him step by step what she is doing and even which instruments are used for what purpose.  This help him to be more anxious and visit the clinic.
my Root canal done By Dr. Dipika was also painless and was well managed.
All of the above it is a littel bit expensive but worth it as right treatment cost u painless treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been recommended a very lengthy and specialized treatment for my multiple and complicated dental problems by dentists , which was also cost prohibitive. Therefore, I looked for alternative options


In Dentalfix Clinic , I received all required specialized treatments within two weeks. I found the staff of Dentalfix Clinic delightfully courteous and supportive, and doctors are very experienced and humble. The notable things that I found about the clinic are, firstly, the availability of all types of dental specialists in there, who work coordinately and make concerted effort to provide with a targeted treatment as needed. Secondly, doctors’ use latest technologies and procedures. Besides, they maintain very high hygiene and cleanliness standards. And, my treatment was quite cost effective too in comparison to past experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So happy that I found such experienced and professional doctors on right time. Clinic is very well managed and hygiene is top notch. My fear of dentists went away as soon as I met DrDipika . She was very supportive and guided me throughout my treatment. Dr. Nimisha who did my root canal was also very nice and open about my treatment. Location of the clinic is very easy to reach as it is very near to Kurla stn. I was satisfied after all my visits and check ups. Doctors also follow up after treatment that made my recovery fast and painless. I have no complaints.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Very nice experience.It was my first time with a dentist! But Dr.Dipika didn't make me feel like it was something​ very serious and major. Having said that I would like to tell that my right wisdom tooth in the lower jaw was very close to the nerve. Dr. explained to me the risk in its extraction given the case as well as the complications if the nerve would get damaged during the extraction process. I was bit aapprehensiveabout the result then but given her expertise *** ********* she operated very well without the nerve getting disturbed. 
 
 Would want to thank Dr.Dipika and his team for his service. I had read about the reviews she got and hence wanted her advice in my case.. to which she proved herself once again. Very humble, expert and professional at her job. I would definitely recommend Dr.Dipika to others ...
 Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had 2 root canal treatments done at Dentalfix clinic. It has been a very good experience and the team at Dentalfix led by Dr Dipika is extremely professional. The clinic itself presents a good ambience and puts the mind at ease immediately.  Treatment itself right from identification of the issue to discussion about resolution and the ultimate procedure is performed in a timely and professional manner with ample precautions considering the Covid impact. Like everyone else I am highly scared of dental procedures however the root canal was performed with minimum pain and discomfort. Small things like the soft music always at play during the procedures (mostly Arijit Singh songs) act as a welcome distraction for the mind and show the attention to details to make things as easy for the patient as possible. I would highly recommend Dentalfix to anyone with dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
Dr Dipika has advance equipments and maintain high level of hygiene. She is hard working and talented and complete the treatment quickly. She understands if the patient is getting pain and work accordingly. As a person she is good in nature and treated me with respect.
After two days i don't have any complaint. After being cynical about scaling I have to say it feels good and my voice has become clearer.
Her colleague Khushboo had done RCT, whom I trusted but now she has left the country. Good experience. Thank you very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dipika Bharani is very polite and friendly. I had gone for a general dental clean up and was amazed by her professionalism. *** **** ********* ******* **** *** ** **** ************* ***** ****** **** *** ***** **** *** ***** She explains every aspect of the issue before proceeding with the treatment. Dentaflix Clinic is an ultra modern clinic which is easily one of the best in Vile-Parle. Her fees are very nominal  compared to the treatment and service provided. Best Dental Care Experience !!!

Dr. Dipika is very professional, she takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice , It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids, I highly recommend Dr. Dipika and her staff for kids and adults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
These are the reasons why I will continue to come here:

1. The dentists are highly skilled, pleasant and make you feel at ease (I appreciate this) 
2. Open 6 days a week 
3. Easy to make appointments (online PRACTO or call office) 
4. They also offer late evening appointments 
5. The front desk is very helpful, proactive and quickly provides you with all the details needed.
6. place is neat and clean and they use latest equipment and technology.
Highly recommended

review: I had a fabulous experience at dr. Dipika's clinic. I had visited 2 - 3 dentist before consulting Dr. Dipika. All of them said a surgery would be required for my wisdom tooth extraction.
